item.title: Official Roll20 Demiplane Integration Feature Is Now in Beta
item.content:encoded:
https://techraptor.net/tabletop/news/official-roll20-demiplane-integration-feature-is-now-in-beta

Roll20 has rolled out an official Demiplane integration beta. This merging of two of the most popular virtual tabletop platforms has been highly anticipated since Roll20 acquired Demiplane in 2024. Now, users can enjoy the benefits.

The Roll20 Demiplane Integration Beta Announcement

According to an official press release, the Roll20 Demiplane integration beta is the result of months of active development and community feedback. The result are expanded key features integrated into both platforms as of today.

One of the new features in this beta is cross-platform sync. If you own any titles on Roll20 or Demiplane, you can access that content on both platforms at no additional cost. This feature is added automatically if you have an account linked with Roll20 and Demiplane.

The cross-platform sync applies to all material from Pathfinder 2E, Starfinder 2E, Vampire: The Masquerade V5, Alien: The Roleplaying Game, and Marvel Multiverse RPG. In addition, select elements from Cyberpunk Red and Fallout: The Roleplaying Game will support this feature.

“We’re continuing to work closely with our incredible publishing partners to expand system support for Cross-Platform Sync,” said Jayme Boucher, Senior Marketing Manager at Roll20. “In today’s economy, we know that investing in your hobbies can feel like a luxury. That’s why we’re committed to giving players the most access and value possible for their hard-earned money. This is one way we can help stretch every dollar and make it easier for people to connect and support their mental well-being through play.”

A second feature of the Roll20 Demiplane integration beta is a shared subscription. If you have an account linked to Roll20 and Demiplane and pay a premium subscription for one, you get the premium benefits of both platforms at no additional cost. This includes content sharing with up to 24 players and unlimited character creation on the Demiplane platform.

Lastly, users can use Demiplane character sheets in the Roll20 VTT. All player actions work as before within one interface. The Demiplane character sheets can be used on the following games in Roll20:

  • Pathfinder 2E
  • Starfinder 2E
  • Marvel Multiverse Roleplaying Game
  • Cyberpunk Red
  • Vampire: The Masquerade V5
  • Alien: The Roleplaying Game
  • Candela Obscura

The press release states that more TTRPGs will be gaining support between Demiplane and Roll20 in the near future. Titles that include Darrington Press' upcoming fantasy RPG, Daggerfall, and Brotherwise Games' Cosmere RPG.

Ever since he was small, Tyler Chancey has had a deep, abiding love for video games and a tendency to think and overanalyze everything he enjoyed. This… More about Tyler
